section.title: Conformance statements
section.para: The keywords "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in .
The normative and informative sections of this specification are identified by the labels "This section is normative" and "This section is informative" respectively.

All parts of this specification are normative except where identified by informative status labels. The application of informative status to sections and appendices applies to all child content, examples and subsections they may contain.
